text: aur isi tarah tujhe tera parvardigaar barguzida karega aur tujhe mamela fehmi (ya qaabo ki tabeer) bhi sikhaega aur apni nemath tujhe bharpoor ata farmayega aur yaqoob ke ghar walo ko bhi jaise ke us ne us se pehle tere dada aur par dada yani ibraheem wa Isâ€™haaq ko bhi bharpoor apni nemath di, yaqinan tera rub bahuth bade ilm wala aur zabardast hikmath wala hai
